segments.text: Now my attention is drawn back to the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks incredibly unstable, I must say.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out at an odd angle, and it seems to be tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of fear just watching him stretch so far for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so intent on the jar that he doesn't seem to notice how precarious his perch is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move, one slight shift, and he could easily tumble right off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can already imagine the clatter of the stool, perhaps a cry, and then a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making me genuinely nervous, thinking about him hitting his head on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors also look like they could be dangerous edges if he slipped.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice and stabilize that stool before an accident happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below seems unaware of the danger, only focused on the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a stark reminder of how quickly things can go wrong when no one is watching carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm really concerned for his safety in that moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn from a cookie raid into a trip to the emergency room in an instant.
segments.speaker: PAR
